email_body: good to me. get prices for the different types of rooms "Jennifer White" <jenwhite7@zdnetonebox.com> on 04/05/2001 12:19:52 PM To: john.arnold@enron.com cc: Subject: NY hotels Look what I found: http://www.60thompson.com/ There aren't many photos, but it sounds nice. Travelocity.com shows cheaper, promotional rates. And I'll find out from Paula where she made her reservations. I'm done. It's all up to you now.
